name: victoria Coordination Tasks
description: Active coordination tasks managed by victoria

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Review and align on style requirements for SSELFIE Studio UI implementation. Key areas to address:
1. Confirm the proposed color palette aligns with your style vision (Deep Noir, Gallery White, Metallic Silver, etc.)
2. Validate typography choices (Times New Roman for headers, Helvetica Neue for interface)
3. Ensure the "high-fashion editorial experience" matches your style direction
4. Review interactive elements (gradient-filled buttons, animations) for brand consistency
5. Provide any additional style guidelines needed for implementation
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're reviewing Aria's UI mockup to ensure the style direction aligns with your vision before implementation. This is critical for maintaining consistent brand identity across the platform.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Please provide comprehensive UI mockups and style specifications for SSELFIE Studio platform, including:
1. Current design system documentation
2. UI component library status
3. Brand style guide elements
4. User interface mockups for key journey touchpoints (TRAIN/STYLE/SHOOT/BUILD/MANAGE)
5. Responsive design specifications
6. Color palette and typography system
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We need to assess current UI/UX assets for launch readiness and ensure consistent brand experience across the platform. This will help determine which components are ready for immediate launch versus future development.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Confirm styling feature capabilities for €27 Selfie Starter vs €67 Brand Builder tiers. What styling features are fully implemented and ready for immediate launch?
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Pricing strategy analysis and feature set confirmation for immediate launch

assignedTasks.taskDescription:

1. Confirm if TypeScript implementation is planned
2. Provide technical architecture recommendation for TypeScript setup
3. Create necessary configuration files (tsconfig.json)
4. Set up essential TypeScript dependencies
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Critical task to implement TypeScript for improved code quality and maintainability. This affects auth, upload, and core services which are essential for the SSELFIE STUDIO platform.
